description: Gust has developed many popular role-playing game series, including the Atelier series, Surge Concerto series, and Nights of Azure series. These series use game assets saved in various proprietary file formats, including the G1T format.

Most players will never encounter or need to open a game's G1T files. However, modders may want to extract, modify, and replace the textures a G1T file contains, to change in-game characters' and items' appearance.
